TopicTitle: The trip to the sun dissaster

Articles.Content:
so i set of on my first mun landing mission using a trutorial like most but i started by using alot of advanced sas es but what really happend when i selected my target as the mun it headid to kurmen exit then it just went straight for the sun as it hit the kurmen exit thing the space craft froze then i started the fuel again and the space craft was going no where now jebediah is stuck with to other runts

any one got any tips on landing on the mun?
Welcome to the forums and Id recommend looking in the How To section of the forum as there are several good tutorials there

There are plenty of tips both on the forum and some particularly useful ones on YouTube for landing on things.

Sounds like you ran out of fuel.
